A " ladder" - A ladder made out of a single piece of metal or plastic, with rungs that are curved or angled to make it easier to climb up and down.
A "smart ladder" - A ladder with built-in sensors that can detect when it's being used and adjust its stability accordingly to prevent falls.
A "collapsible ladder" - A ladder that can fold up into a compact, portable package for easy storage and transport.
A "modular ladder" - A ladder made up of interchangeable sections that can be rearranged to suit different needs, such as a tall ladder for a high ceiling or a wide ladder for a large room.
A "staircase ladder" - A ladder with stairs-like rungs that can be used as a makeshift staircase for short periods of time.
